page.title: 19 Ecology North Petherwin
page.content: The Pearces' have farmed 200 acres on the Werrington Estate over 20 years.It is bounded by{coniferous plantation there are{fox,badgers,weasels,rabbits, {moles and deer.}Fox are welcome as they move on if breeding leads to over crowding,badgers stay even if short of food,this is when they catch disease like{Tuberculosis.}Mrs.Pearce believes that TB is not caused by badgers as the authorities do,none of their cows has ever had the disease. South of Petherwin Gate is{Hellescott Vineyard, growing white wine grapes,wine is made and bottled on site.Vines grow in opaque plastic houses,winds are a problem.Farms have 1 or more{working {dogs}for herding cattle and sheep.Few children keep pets, mainly girls have {ponies.Pet dogs}are required to be licensed.Many{semi wild cats}abound keeping{rats and mice}at bay.
